name: ECHO AI
description:
Echo is an intelligent robot that can chat with children and tell stories to children. Players only need to wear AR to play freely in Echo's room. Children with autism can also do some language training with AIEcho while they are curiously exploring the room, which is of great help to the sensitivity of autistic patients to the outside world. In the game mode of story mode, the child can listen to the story of the Echo while interacting with the Echo, such as picking up a stone. . .

Features:

Single-player VR experience.

Helping children with autism

Interaction is everywhere!

Interact with various toys in the room

control

Use support for Meta Quest VR

Grab the object with the triggers of both hands (usually the index finger).

Tap the touchpad on the controller to teleport between space
